title: 83/405/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 July 1983 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 July 1983
on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC
(Only the French text is authentic)
(83/405/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Having regard to the Grand-Ducal regulation of 8 March 1983 the provisions concerning the implementation in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg of Directive 72/159/EEC continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 July 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 96, 23. 4. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 193, 3. 7. 1982, p. 37.
